entry.title: Saturday: Blizzard. High minus 6.
entry.summary: Blizzard. Local snowfall amount 5 cm. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 60. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 19 this afternoon. Forecast issued 12:27 PM EST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 5. POP 40%
